location: Chongyang Road, Nangang District, near Nangang Software Park MRT Station (418m)
notes: 3BR/2BA apartment on 9F/15F in a 10-year-old granite-facade elevator building on Chongyang Road. Comes fully furnished with appliances, includes flat parking and balcony. Good natural light from mid-upper floor. Building condition described as recently repainted and well-maintained, but without interior photos it is unclear if fixtures are truly modern. The balcony needs inspection for baby-safe railings. No pets allowed. Management fee NT$4,464/month extra. Located near Nangang Software Park MRT, convenient area with many shops and schools nearby.
